===Pre-requisites===
  * Java 5+
  * Ant 1.6.5+


===Installing ddljen===

  # Download the latest version of ddljen.
  # Unzip the distribution archive (ddljen-x.x.zip) to the directory you wish to install ddljen. The subdirectory ddljen-x.x will be created from the archive. These instructions will refer to this directory as DDLJEN_HOME.
  # To verify that ddljen was correctly installed, type `ant` at the command line from the DDLJEN_HOME directory. ddljen should generate the SQL file for the sample database schema that is provided (java-petstore-2.0.xml).
